projects.name: Meteor Bot
projects.subtitle: Meeting Assistant
highlights: Scaled an AI meeting assistant to 10,000+ users with real-time transcription, summaries, and action items
Architected serverless backend with AWS Lambda + Prisma processing 500+ concurrent transcription jobs
Integrated Stripe payments, Clerk authentication, and OAuth (Google, Slack, Jira)
Built accessible UI with Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores

projects.name: StockWise
projects.subtitle: Smart Stock Alerts
highlights: Built dual-market stock tracking platform (NSE/BSE + US) with real-time price updates and TradingView charts
Engineered multi-channel alert system processing 50,000+ daily events with instant Email & Telegram notifications
Designed personalized watchlist with debounced API calls, improving responsiveness by 3x
Automated daily market digests via Inngest, increasing engagement by 40%

projects.name: Timeline
projects.subtitle: Workspace & Role Manager
highlights: Enabled real-time collaboration for 10,000+ concurrent users with Go WebSocket server (4ms median latency)
Secured 50+ API endpoints with WebAuthn/OAuth, containerized with Docker, automated zero-downtime deployments
Optimized frontend with Web Workers, code-splitting, and lazy loading, reducing main-thread blocking by 40%
Designed interactive onboarding tour, cutting setup time by 65% and boosting retention
Delivered 3 production-ready features and resolved 6+ bugs in Agile sprints, improving application stability by 25%
Refactored 5+ core UI components using ShadCN, Zod, and TanStack Query, reducing load times by 30%
Conducted 10+ peer code reviews, raising team code quality by 20%
